enableMerge.hint: Try to merge the content when saving a document (disable only if it causes issues)
enableMerge.name: enableMerge

marginAvatar.hint: Show on the side of the editing area the avatars of the users that are currently typing
marginAvatar.name: marginAvatar

toolbarUserlist.hint: Show the list of connected users at the top of the editing area
toolbarUserlist.name: toolbarUserlist
toolbarUserlist.values: name=Display only user names|avatar=Display only user avatars|both=Display both user names and avatars

async_context.name: async_context
async_context.values: action=Action|doc.reference=Document|icon.theme=Icon theme|locale=Language|rendering.defaultsyntax=Default syntax|rendering.restricted=Restricted|rendering.targetsyntax=Target syntax|request.base=Request base URL|request.parameters=Request parameters|request.url=Request URL|request.wiki=Request wiki|user=User|wiki=Wiki

property.content: {{velocity}} {{html clean="false"}} #set ($configClassRef = 'XWiki.Realtime.ConfigurationClass') #set ($configLocalRef = 'XWiki.Realtime.Configuration') #set ($configRef = $services.model.resolveDocument($configLocalRef)) #set ($configObj = $xwiki.getDocument($configRef).getObject($configClassRef)) #if ("$!configObj.getValue('useGlobalConfig')" != '0' && !$xcontext.isMainWiki()) #set ($configRef = $services.model.resolveDocument($configLocalRef, $services.model.createWikiReference($xcontext.mainWikiName))) #set ($configObj = $xwiki.getDocument($configRef).getObject($configClassRef)) #end #getUserAvatarURL($xcontext.userReference $avatarURL 120) ## Note that we have to pass some document information that is missing from the meta: ## * meta includes only the raw document locale value which is the same for documents with translations (e.g. having ## English as default locale) and for technical documents that don't have translations (e.g. having ROOT as default ## locale) ## * meta includes the document version but not its timestamp which is needed to be able to properly merge on save. #set ($config = { 'webSocketURL': $services.websocket.url('netflux'), 'user': { 'name': $xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false), 'avatarURL': $avatarURL.url, 'advanced': $isAdvancedUser }, 'document': { 'language': $tdoc.realLocale, 'modified': $tdoc.date.time }, 'toolbarUserlist': $configObj.getValue('toolbarUserlist'), 'marginAvatar': $configObj.getValue('marginAvatar'), 'enableMerge': $configObj.getValue('enableMerge') }) <script id="realtime-config" type="application/json">$jsontool.serialize($config).replace( '<', '\u003C')</script> {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
